caption.p: Photomicrographs of infected RBC and uninfected RBCs treated with the A. hispidum. extract. The figure shows photomicrographs of uninfected RBCs (a), infected RBCs without treatment (b), infected RBCs treated with 13.0 µg/ml (c), infected RBCs treated with 52.1 µg/ml (d), infected RBCs treated with 104.1 µg/ml (e), and infected RBCs treated with 416.6 µg/ml (f). Arrows show DNA comets of the parasite.
